text:
have not heard of that issue. *By chance do you have multiple HubSpot.config.yml files?*

I know some members of our community will create multiple config files so they can effectively have the CLI auto switch the default account based on what project folder they’re in. If you were doing that - you’d have multiple config files, and each would be a separate list of authed accounts.
No. I only have 1 HubSpot.config.yml file.

hmm very strange. If you notice any kind of pattern to when it seems to happen let us know.

If it seems to happen when you use a certain CLI command let us know.

Hey <@U01B10S09FU>, did you get any further with this? The only thing I was able to get in hubl-html files were Emmet abbreviations, by mapping html-hubl to html in emmet settings. But I would reaally enjoy having the full snippets. I keep going back and forth between file types juste to have the intellisense!
